DOC.brief_summary: To describe normal range muscle mass function Chinese adult .
DOC.detailed_description: The study objective setup normal range muscle mass function Chinese adult .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Young adult age 25 34 year , inclusively . 2 . Adult judge good health determine his/her medical history his/her selfreport enrol center personnel confirm clinical examination physician . 3 . Adult BMI 18.5 26.9 . 4 . Male nonpregnant nonlactating female . Nonpregnant confirm urine pregnant test . And nonlactating define postpartum 18 month . 5 . Subject voluntarily sign date informed consent form , approve Independent Ethics Committee/Institutional Review Board ( IEC/IRB ) prior participation study . 1 . Subject heavy manual labor . 2 . Subject professional semiprofessional athlete game player . 3 . Subject physical disability , loss hand foot limbs physical disability may affect physical activity affect distribution muscle mass opinion study physician . 4 . Subject know chronic disease endocrine system disease ( include type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus , hyperthyroidism hypothyroidism ) , cardiovascular disease , liver disease , renal disease selfreport . 5 . Subject active infection TB , HIV hepatitis selfreport . 6 . Subject currently experience diarrhea anorexia within 7days prior enrollment . 7 . Subject plan intensive physical activity 3 day prior schedule BIA measurement . 8 . Subject thyroid malfunction ( serum fT4 level and/or serum TSH level reference range lab ) 9 . Subject implanted electronic device , orthopedic metal implantation , pacemaker , cardiac defibrillator , metal hip , metal knee joint , metal fracture internal fixation , etc . 10 . Subject drug addiction alcohol addiction . 11 . Subject anemia ( blood hemoglobin level le 120 g/L male 110 g/L female ) . 12 . Subject malnourish study physician 's opinion 13 . Subject active cancer selfreport 14 . Subject lose gained 5 % body weight past 3 month 15 . Subject attend clinical trial approve AN
